head.title: Cardiovascular System Introduction Review and Assessment

body.p: Before taking the quiz below, consider again the learning objectives for this module. Could you demonstrate each of these objectives? If so, you will be ready for the assessment below. If not, consider reviewing content related to these objectives before attempting the assessment.

li.p: Explain how the cardiovascular system performs the function of moving material through the body.
Identify major diseases associated with the cardiovascular system and their causes.
